bullet-hell-js.title: Bullet Hell JS
bullet-hell-js.desc: A bullet hell shooter written in pure Javascript.

uncross-the-lines.title: Uncross the Lines
uncross-the-lines.long_desc: A unique implementation of the "uncross the lines" puzzle game, where you can group and move around multiple dots at once.

korean-number-practice.title: Korean Number Practice
korean-number-practice.desc: An app for practicing reading Korean numbers quickly and adding them together.
korean-number-practice.long_desc: An app for practicing reading Korean numbers quickly and adding them together.

input-js.title: Input.js
input-js.desc: A simple Javascript library for handling mouse and keyboard input in a granular, user-agnostic way.
input-js.long_desc: A simple Javascript library for handling mouse and keyboard input in a granular, user-agnostic way.

static-site-generator.title: Static Site Generator
static-site-generator.desc: A simple static site generator, good for rendering plain text with simple CSS backgrounds.
static-site-generator.long_desc: A simple static site generator, good for rendering plain text with simple CSS backgrounds.
